All of Miyabi's "all time" popular works are wholesome or good in general and it seems the only time he's worked on an NTR doujin is when he worked with other artists and there may only be one or two NTRs he's ever done himself. After reading the prologue, which is literally on the second page, he's liked her since the third grade and she likes him as well (not sure for how long though, but she reciprocated his confession without hesitation) and she even rejected the most handsome guy in the soccer club earlier in the day. Taking in the scenery and atmosphere in both the prologue and this, there's nothing in this doujin that would suggest it to be an NTR story later on 10/10
If this suddenly turns out to be a NTR story I am going to be gravely disapointed.

So I've read a lot of hentai for many years now, far more than I could remember, I've read all kind of styles, yet only a few of them could be called masterpiece. I have almost never posted any comment, only for masterpieces, and this one is for sure one of them, a legendary one. There is no trick or anything, while recent doujins use unusual pupils or dialogs or other gimmicks to increase the sexual tension of a scene (not that is is bad, I quite like that), this hentai  just stays on the classic, but everything is god tier qualities : Amazing art style, amazing frame transition, a pacing completely in control. I like that we don't hear what the girl is thinking or feeling, there is no need. Everything is powerfully conveyed through the drawings. Just look at the expressions, just look at the bodies how they curve ! At the end when we switched to First person POV, What a powerful scene !  I can safely say that this is pure art, a masterpiece in its purest form.
